articles.title: Galaxy S21 gets its last OS update, One UI 7, ahead of schedule - SamMobile
articles.description: After releasing the update in Europe and South Korea, Samsung has released the stable One UI 7.0 update for the Galaxy S23 series in India. The company has delayed the update by several months compared to its previous releases, but One UI 7.0 brings major UI …
articles.content: The Galaxy S21 series is now receiving One UI 7 ahead of schedule. The 2021 flagship was slated to get the Android 15-based update in May, but we all know that Samsung beat its timeframe by a few day… [+1736 chars]

articles.title: Vega-C rocket launches European forest-monitoring 'Biomass' satellite to orbit (video) - Space
articles.description: Liftoff occurred at 5:15 a.m. ET on Tuesday (April 29).
articles.content:
A European forest-monitoring satellite headed toward orbit from South America early Tuesday morning (April 29).
